original_text: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God. The Lord your God has chosen you out of all the peoples on the face of the earth to be his people, his treasured possession.
korean_text: 너는 여호와 네 하나님의 성민이라 네 하나님 여호와께서 지상 만민 중에서 너를 자기 기업의 백성으로 택하셨나니

sentences.original_text: For you are a people holy to the Lord your God.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와께 속한 거룩한 백성이라.

sentences.original_text: The Lord your God has chosen you
out of all the peoples on the face of the earth

sentences.korean_translation: 그의 소중한 소유가 되게 하시려고 함이라.
